content.raw:
I have tried for the life of me to get the windows CI build working. I've uploaded two versions of zeromq, but I can't get either to work

* http://gazebosim.org/distributions/win32/deps/ZeroMQ-4.1.6-vc15-x64-dll-MD.zip
* http://gazebosim.org/distributions/win32/deps/ZeroMQ-4.2.2-vc15-x64-dll-MD.zip

I don't know what else to do
